name: home-assistant
description: Home Assistant is a popular open source home automation platform that runs locally and integrates with thousands of smart devices and online services. It provides dashboards, automations, voice control and a powerful extensible ecosystem.
features: Device Integration: 2000+ integrations, Smart lights, thermostats, sensors. Connect everything.
Automations: Visual editor, YAML configuration, Trigger-based actions. Automate your life.
Local Control: No cloud required, Fast response, Privacy-focused. Keep it local.
Voice Control: Alexa, Google Assistant, Siri integration. Control by voice.
Energy Management: Monitor consumption, Solar tracking, Cost analysis. Save energy.
Security: Camera integration, Alarm systems, Presence detection. Protect your home.
Dashboards: Customizable UI, Mobile apps, Tablet views. Beautiful interfaces.
Add-ons: Extend functionality, Community store, Easy installation. Endless possibilities.
Scenes: One-tap control, Mood lighting, Activity presets. Perfect ambiance.
Notifications: Mobile alerts, Email, SMS, Custom actions. Stay informed.
Community: Active forums, Thousands of blueprints, Regular updates. Never alone.
